short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect yourself from distractions and fight digital addiction while browsing the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Increase your productivity by shielding yourself from distractions on social media websites.
All shields can be enabled/disabled within a click, you won't have to uninstall the app to bypass the shields.
- Disable Facebook newsfeed
- Disable Facebook notification bubbles
- Disable Youtube recommended videos, suggestions, homepage videos...
- Disable Reddit comments
